title: Is President Lu Bankrupt Today? - Novel Updates
genre: Fantasy   Josei   Mature   Romance   Slice of Life
tags: Early Romance   Female Protagonist   Godly Powers   Transmigration
author: 叶绵绵
description:
As a God of Poverty, Cen Xi’s performance has always been very good, until……
One day, Cen Xi wakes up and finds herself in a parallel time and space as a unlucky eighteenth-tier actress and a certain big boss’ secret wife.
She goes to live in the big boss’ house. Since then, the big boss begins to suffer a reversal of fortune……
And Cen Xi discovers that her sealed powers seem to be slowly returning.
Can she go back by expending all of the big boss’ fortune?
So, Cen Xi starts to crazily spend the big boss’ money and swipe his credit card in hopes that she will soon be able to return to the God Realm.
But why is the big boss’ money increasing? And it’s increasing at a faster and faster rate?
Her powers as a God of Poverty won’t be able to suppress the big boss’ ability to increase his wealth soon!
This isn't scientific! 
………
Lu Jingcheng: ? ? ? 
Other people’s wives hope their husbands get rich, but my wife hopes that I’ll go bankrupt?>
